title: Whistleblower TEA, TURDminator 11.5.19
itunes:title: Whistleblower TEA, TURDminator 11.5.19
description:
In episode 509, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and FilmDrunk Frotcast co-host Matt Lieb to discuss Trump hating this impeachment news, 2020 Democratic polling and how the mainstream media works around it, how Beto O'Rourke's campaign failed, the alleged news about Jared Kushner's involvement with Jamal Khashoggi's murder, the new Terminator film, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump's impeachment inbox
  2. The 2020 Democratic Presidential Primary
  3. Inside Beto O’Rourke’s collapse
  4. ‘Seven whistleblowers’
  5. 'Terminator: Dark Fate' Puts Franchise on Ice, Faces $120M-Plus Loss
  6. We Went There: A Feminist Interpretation of Terminator: Dark Fate
  7. 7 Films With Symbolism You Didn't Notice (And Can't Unsee)
  8. 'Terminator' and a Complicated Legacy of Female Empowerment
  9. WATCH: Tame Impala - It Might Be Time (Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
